seed_pair.known: I like feeling as if I'm nearly ready to go.
seed_pair.target: Me gusta sentir como si estuviera casi preparado para ir.

curation_metadata.curated_by: Claude Code - Phase 5 v3.0 strict GATE compliance
changes_from_previous: Fixed GATE violations: removed 'mejor' (not taught until S0029)
Fixed GATE violations: removed 'preparado' from LEGOs before S0026L05
Fixed GATE violations: removed 'para' usage before S0026L06
Ensured all Spanish words come from exact taught forms only

practice_phrases: I like to meet people who speak Spanish
me gusta encontrar personas que hablan español
I like to start talking more soon
me gusta comenzar a hablar más pronto
I like to be able to speak Spanish with you
me gusta poder hablar español contigo
I like to speak Spanish with everyone else later on
me gusta hablar español con todos los demás más tarde
I like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow
me gusta adivinar lo que va a ocurrir mañana
S0026L01.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0025 LEGOs only

practice_phrases: I like to be able to feel
I'd like to be able to feel
he wants to be able to feel
I'm not going to be able to feel
I'd like to be able to feel after you finish
me gustaría poder sentir después de que termines
S0026L02.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0026L01 LEGOs only

practice_phrases: to feel as if I were

S0026L03.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0026L02 LEGOs only. NOTE: 'estuviera' introduced in this LEGO.

practice_phrases: I like to feel as if I were nearly

S0026L04.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0026L03 LEGOs only
S0026L04.note: Avoiding 'preparado' and 'para' - not taught until L05 and L06

practice_phrases: as if I were nearly ready

me gustaría sentir como si estuviera casi preparado
S0026L05.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0026L04 LEGOs only

S0026L06.gate_compliance: STRICT - All words from S0001-S0026L05 LEGOs only. NOTE: 'para' and 'ir' introduced in this LEGO.
